glsa.title: Newsbeuter: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: Insufficient input validation in newsbeuter may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary shell commands.

background.p: Newsbeuter is a RSS/Atom feed reader for the text console.

description.p: J.H.M. Dassen reported that the open-in-browser command does not properly escape shell metacharacters in the URL before passing it to system().

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a feed with specially crafted URLs, possibly resulting in the remote execution of arbitrary shell commands with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
